Shin Youme

Introduction

Shin Youme, also known as Shin Yumi, Shin Yoomi, and YouMe, is a South Korean singer, songwriter, and composer under her own label called Newme world.

She first debuted on July 20, 2009, as part of the South Korean band Riddim with the EP "On the Terrace".

In 2013, she participated in the second season of The Voice Korea where she was complimented for her vocals despite not winning.

Before that, she was mostly known as a vocal trainer for YG Entertainment, teaching well-known singers such as Lee Hi.

In 2017 and 2019, she was a vocal coach for MNET's popular survival show serie Produce 101 Season 2 and Produce X 101.

Shin Youme made her solo debut on August 28, 2017, with the release of the single "Digitalian New Vol. 2" and the song "Could You Love Me?".

Since December 2023, she has been a part of the South Korean duo Add All Ears along with Naakyeum.
